title: Connection failure
body:
Hello there!

My client has been busted for two weeks by now, and since riot support takes 1-2 days to respond, I've decided to reach out to you.

I've been trying to fix these problems by following the steps provided on the support page and the ones I've received in my support tickets.

These are the screenshots I took: http://imgur.com/a/u7Ttq
-the client is unable to connect to chat
-the client cannot load in the game after the campion select.
-anything else works fine (shops, collection, runes etc.)

I hope someone knows how to fix this issue, I would really love to play league again.

replies.body:
[FIX]

I've reached out to my ISP and it seems they've been able to allow port 5060. I reset my router after, the game was able to connect to chat.

I think this could be a few different issues. First, I took a look at your ticket and saw that Port 5060 (pretty important port for communications) was **blocked** on your network. You may need to reach out to your ISP about unblocking this port entirely.

The second issue looks suspiciously like the known issue listed on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#eune). I recommend following the directions listed in that ticker message so we can confirm whether or not this is the known issue.

Let me know what happens.

I've ran a network analysis and saw you were right about port 5060:
**[Link removed]**

This is what I've had after logging into my router and trying to allowing it:
http://imgur.com/0WB7QBq

What do I do now ?

It's still the same unfortunately.

I went over to my friends' place two days ago to check if League worked there, and it actually did. I could play using either cable or wifi connection. The next day I've experienced no problems at my own flat either after going through these steps: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/hu/articles/204134104

Today however, everything the same as it used to be. My client still won't connect to chat or games. 

I believe I've already allowed port 5060 because when I logged into my router and tried putting it in there I've had a window popping up that it already exists.

So how come one day it works and the next day it doesn't ?
jesus cant they fix that, its so stupid and takes too much time...
